name: spellcasters-bot
description: Discord bot for Spellcasters Community API

scripts.pack: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path spellcasters-bot-v2.zip) { Remove-Item spellcasters-bot-v2.zip }; Compress-Archive -Path dist,src,package.json,package-lock.json,tsconfig.json,build_api.py,DEPLOYMENT.md,deploy.sh,.env.example,.prettierrc,eslint.config.mjs,scripts,data,README.md,LICENSE -DestinationPath spellcasters-bot-v2.zip"
